problem: Our automated fruit harvesting gripper damages 12% of apples during pick. We need to reduce damage to <2% while maintaining 1.5 second cycle time. The gripper uses pneumatic fingers with silicone pads. Apples range from 60-90mm diameter.

We need a portable baby bottle warmer that heats 150ml of refrigerated milk (4°C) to 37°C in under 90 seconds with ±2°C uniformity. Must be cordless, weigh under 500g, and work with standard bottle sizes. Current PCM warmers take 15+ minutes.

Our injection molding process for thin-wall containers (0.4mm) has 8% warpage rejection rate. Cycle time is 4.2 seconds. Material is PP with 2% talc. Mold has 4 cavities. We need <1% warpage while maintaining or improving cycle time.

Design a passive cooling system for outdoor 5G small cell equipment that maintains junction temperature below 85°C in 45°C ambient with 150W heat dissipation. No fans allowed (dust/reliability). Current heatsink is 2kg, need to reduce to under 800g.

We manufacture precision ceramic bearings for semiconductor equipment. Current surface finish is Ra 0.05μm achieved with diamond lapping at 45 min/part. Customer wants Ra 0.02μm. How can we achieve this without doubling process time?

Our lithium-ion battery pack for e-bikes experiences thermal runaway propagation in abuse testing. Need to prevent cell-to-cell propagation while keeping pack energy density above 180 Wh/kg. Current design uses 3mm aerogel between cells.

Design a mechanism to deploy a 2m diameter antenna from a 10cm cube satellite. Must survive 50g launch loads, deploy reliably in vacuum at -40°C to +80°C, and achieve surface accuracy of λ/20 at 10 GHz. Mass budget: 400g.

Our food processing line needs to detect bone fragments >2mm in chicken breast fillets moving at 1m/s on conveyor. X-ray systems cost $200K+. Need detection accuracy >99% at <$50K equipment cost. Line processes 10,000 kg/day.

We need to seal a rotating shaft (50mm dia, 3000 RPM) against 10 bar pressure differential with zero leakage for hydrogen gas service. Conventional lip seals leak too much. Magnetic seals are too expensive ($15K+). Budget: $2K per seal.

Our concrete 3D printer extrudes at 50mm/s with 30mm layer height. Print quality degrades above 35°C ambient due to premature setting. Need to print in desert conditions (45°C) without climate control. Material is standard Portland cement mix.
